name: Pong
body:
### Welcome
Hello and welcome to [@DogeyDogs](http://www.twitter.com/REALDogeyDogs) first ever repository based on the game,
Pong

### What is Pong?
Pong is a game where you have a paddle each and you have to try and score against the other player.
Essentially it is table tennis, old style.

### How many players?
2.

### What are the controls?
## Player 1:
UP ARROW = Up
DOWN ARROW = Down
## Player 2:
W = Up
S = Down
